data.eml:eml: Aleurotrachelus Quaintance & Baker (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) and allied genera from Taiwan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dubey, Anil Kumar, Ko, Chiun-Cheng (2010): Aleurotrachelus Quaintance & Baker (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) and allied genera from Taiwan. Zootaxa 2685: 1-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276482
